source_subject: Can't reconnect my Pinterest account - authorization keeps failing
source_body:
Hi, I've been trying to reconnect my Pinterest account for the past 3 days and keep getting an error. When I click 'Connect Pinterest' it takes me to Pinterest to authorize, I click allow, but then I get redirected back to Tailwind and it says 'Authorization failed. Please try again.' I've tried:

1. Clearing my browser cache
2. Using a different browser (Chrome and Safari)
3. Disconnecting and reconnecting from Pinterest side
4. Logging out of Tailwind completely

Nothing works! This is really frustrating because I have a big campaign planned for next week and I can't schedule any pins right now. The error started happening after Pinterest asked me to re-verify my account.

My Pinterest username is @myfashionblog and my Tailwind email is sarah@example.com.

Please help ASAP!
